Package chess

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Board
    An 8x8 chess game board.
    Chess
    A non-graphical character-based chess game.
    EnPassant
    A class that implements the special En Passant capturing move by a pawn.
    FileRank
    An utility class that helps manage the location of a game piece on the board.
    Piece
    A base class that implements a generic chess Piece.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Chess.gameState
    Enumerated states of a chess game
    Chess.pawnPromotionChoices
    Enumerated pawn promotion choices
    Piece.Colors
    Color definition for chess pieces (either black or white)
    Piece.PieceNames
    Name definition for all chess pieces
